profile:
Recently awarded the title of Best of Eastern Ontario for Roofing & Siding companies by HomeStars, Rydel Roofing has more than 30 years of experience as Ottawa's premier roofing service companies. Boasting an A+ BBB Rating, a perfect Facebook Review score and a 97% customer review rating on HomeStars, our business is driven by a passion for elevated customer service, quality craftsmanship and old fashioned honesty. We have been certified to install almost every major roofing and siding product in North America so you can rest assured that our projects are covered under warranty.

Need financing? Ask our team how you can get 24 month ZERO INTEREST equal payments on your latest project! 

Services/Products:
Asphalt Roofing, Metal Roofing, Flat Roofing, Roofing Repairs, Eavestrough and Gutter, Siding, Roofing Products, Roofing Ventilation, Commercial Roofing, Residential Roofing

Brands
IKO, CertainTeed, Owens Corning, BP, GAF, James Hardie, Genteck, Euroshield, Wakefield Bridge, Heritage, Ameri-Cana, Junior H-F, T-Rex, Velux Skylights, Duraflow, Venmar

In business since: 2012

http://rydelroofing.com/
1800 Woodward Dr, Ottawa, ON K2C 0P7
(613) 656-8606
products: Eavestrough and gutter, roofing ventilation, roofing products and roofing skylight
services: When you need siding and roofing services in Ottawa and surroundings area, you want a team that can quickly arrive onsite to complete the task. We have teams of qualified workers for both residential and commercial clients that are ready to respond quickly and effectively when you have a roofing problem that needs prompt attention. Our services includes roofing, siding, roof repairs, evastrough, snow and ice removal, soffit and fascia

profile:
Established in 2008, Firon Roofing Inc. has grown to a full service roofing company offering Lifetime and Designer roofing systems to Ottawa and surrounding areas, with a focus on transparency, integrity and customer commitment.
Firon is an active member of the National Roofing Contractors Association, The Ottawa Chamber of Commerce, an A+ member of the Better Business Bureau, and Certified through the GAF Manufacturer holding the status of Certified Weather Stopper Roofing Contractor and Certified Green Roofer.
Firon has been recognized in Profit Magazine (2012) as #9 in the Profit Hot 50 for Canada’s Top New Growth Companies and in the Ottawa Business Journal (2013) Fastest Growing Companies.
Firon Roofing Inc. remains committed to ongoing training, partnerships, and business development, through a passion for education and our community.
services: Re-roofing, new construction roofing, designer and lifetime roofing system, 24hr emergency services, repair services
name: Firon Roofing Inc.

profile: The word “paragon” is defined as a perfect example of a particular quality. At Paragon Contracting & Renovations, we strive to do just that by being the model of excellence in our trade. As a father and son owned business, we know the importance of your household, and we value the importance of comfort and safety of your family’s home. In a competitive industry, we offer advanced expertise and proud workmanship that goes above and beyond. Our exceptional quality of service is not only guaranteed to transform your home, but also leave you feeling satisfied with your investment. When you choose Paragon Contracting & Renovations, you’re putting your trust in solid family values that are backed up by industry leading, Lifetime non pro rated material warranties from GAF.

profile:
We are Eastern Ontario's roofing experts and we strive to provide the best roofing services for our community's home, including yours.

We use top-quality roof shingles to protect your home against extreme weather and for long-lasting results.

Offered Services: 
- Shingle re-roofing
- Shingle roofing repair
- Ventilation upgrade
- Leak repair
- Waterproofing
- Roof inspection
- Roof snow removal

Get a worthwhile investment for your home's roof with SML Construction.
